name: SignalFx
description: SignalFx is a cloud monitoring platform for infrastructure, microservices, and applications. The platform discovers and collects metrics across every component in your cloud environment, replacing traditional point tools and providing real-time predictive analytics. The massively scalable SignalFx architecture is optimized for cloud infrastructureand microservices-based applications and provides powerful visualization, proactive alerting, and collaborative triage capabilities for organizations of all sizes.
